Title: Preparation of papers for international journal of scientific and technology research implementation of csr indonesia menari program By PT Djarum
Source title: International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research
Affiliations: Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Putri Anditia, T.E., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Haryanti, A., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This research aimed to identify the Public Relation strategy that is implemented by PT. Djarum and also to identify how consc ientious this company in applying Indonesia Menari as CSR P rogram of PT. Djarum. This research used a qualitative method in which data collection technique is observation, semi structured interview, and documentation, that is examined using a case study. The result of the research indicated that Bakti Budaya Djaru m Foundation uses PR Pencils strategy in implementing their CSR program. The result of the research also showed that PT. Djar um is at the top in the pyramid of measurement of the seriousness of implementing company CSR by Archie B. Carroll, in which it sig nifies that PT. Djarum implements the CSR program generously. © 2019 International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Corporate Social Responsibility; Strategic of Public Relations
Funding Details: Ministry of National Education and Religious Affairs
Funding Text 1: Sciences / LIPI, Ministry of National Education, Ministry of Health, Ministry of Social Affairs); Universities (UI, ITB, IPB); mass media (Kompas Humanitarian Fund, We Care program of Indosiar).

Title: The effect of communication style Of BINUS starbucks’ barista on customer loyalty
Source title: International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research
Affiliations: Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Kwamila, O.S., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Haryanti, A., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This research aimed to find out whether there is an effect of the communication style of Starbucks BINUS’ barista towards cus tomer loyalty and how big the effect is. The research method used in this research was the quantitative method with a survey to t he Starbucks BINUS’ customer as a sample. This research was calculated using SPSS 23. The result of this research was that there is a significant effect of the communication style of Starbucks BINUS’ barista amounting to 46.4% towards customer loyalty. © 2019 International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Communication; Communication Style; Corporate Image; Customer Loyalty
References: Sumarwan, U., (2011) Riset Pemasaran Dan Konsumen: Panduan Riset Dan Kajian Kepuasan, Perilaku, Pembelian, Gaya Hidup, Loyalitas Dan Persepsi Risiko, , Bogor: IPB Press; Ardianto, E., (2010) Metodologi Penelitian Untuk Public Relations Kuantitatif Dan Kualitatif, , Bandung: Simbiosa Rekatama Media; Kriyantono, R., (2014) Teknik Praktis Riset Komunikasi, , Jakarta: Prenadamedia Group; Sugiyono, (2016) Metode Penelitian Kuantitatif, Kualitatif, Dan R&D, , Bandung: Alfabeta; Syofian, S., (2013) Metode Penelitian Kuantitatif, , Jakarta: PT Fajar Interpratama Mandiri; Kriyantono, R., Writing, P.R., (2012) Teknik Produksi Media Publik Relations Dan Publisitas Korporat, , Jakarta: Kencana; Sunyoto, D., Dasar-Dasar Manajemen Pemasaran (2012) Yogyakarta: CAPS; Effendi, I., (2004) Pengantar Akuakultur, , Jakarta: Penebar Swadaya; Etal Allen, G., Advances in Data Modelling Research (2006) Commun. Title: Role of public relations of the regional secretariats in building the image of Bekasi District government in the public eyes
Source title: International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research
Affiliations: Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Hakim, L., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Haryanti, A., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This study aims to analyze and be able to find out the Role of Regional Secretariat Public Relations in Building the Image of Bekasi District Government in the Public Eye. Efforts made by the Public Relations Secretariat of the Bekasi District Government through various types of publications, genres of community approaches, managing documentation, and obstacles that exist in carrying out public relations tasks. The research method used is descriptive qualitative to obtain valid data according to the results Data collection techniques in the form of semi-structured interviews, observations made since the internship, and documentation. The results of this study show that the Role of the Regional Secretariat Public Relations in Building the Image of the Bekasi District Government in the Public Eye through the operational standards of government public relations. © 2019, International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Government Public Relations; Image of Bekasi Regency Government; Role of Public Relations Regional Secretariat
References: Web Resmi Humas Dan Protokol Kabupaten Bekasi; Sugiyono, S., (2016) Metode Penelitian Kuantitatif, Kualitatif, Dan R&D, , Bandung: Alfabeta; Moleong, L.J., (2007) Metodologi Penelitian Kualitatif, , Bandung: PT Remaja Rosdakarya; Faisal, S., (1989) Format-Format Penelitian Sosial; Ardianto, E., (2011) Handbook of Public Relations.
